thread.title: Excellently positioned to explore Paris on foot
thread.title_full: Excellently positioned to explore Paris on foot - Review of Hotel Antin Trinite, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Angela A
title: Excellently positioned to explore Paris on foot
text: Ideally positioned near to Galerie Lafayette and Opera so we could explore Paris for the day. Loved the modern colourful decor of reception. The rooms were fairly small but clean and perfectly adequate for an overnight. Our 4 year old grandson, who'd never stayed in a hotel before, thought his put-you-up bed with clean white sheets was wonderful. No bath but shower was good.
